name: Black Granite Inscription (free)
label: Gone from home but not from our hearts. How beautiful life was to me. Your music shall play forever in our hearts. May the earth lie light upon thee. Gone. And the light of all our life gone with them. Loved and lost awhile. Always in our hearts. Remembered with lov. Let us cross over the river and rest under the shade of the trees. Love as much as possible in this imperfect world.
